name: Lead
description: Lead is a toxic metal that can cause serious health problems, especially in children. It is commonly found in batteries, paints, and certain types of glass.

name: Mercury
description: Mercury is a highly toxic metal that can cause severe health issues, including damage to the nervous system. It is often found in batteries and some types of switches.

name: Cadmium
description: Cadmium is a toxic metal that can cause kidney damage and bone loss. It is commonly found in rechargeable batteries and pigments.

name: Hexavalent Chromium
description: Hexavalent chromium is a toxic form of chromium that can cause respiratory problems and skin irritation. It is often used in metal plating and dyes.

name: Polybrominated Biphenyls (PBB)
description: PBBs are a group of chemicals used as flame retardants in a variety of consumer products. They can accumulate in the environment and have been linked to adverse health effects.

name: Polybrominated Diphenyl Ethers (PBDE)
description: PBDEs are a group of chemicals used as flame retardants in a variety of consumer products. They can accumulate in the environment and have been linked to adverse health effects.

name: Bis(2-Ethylhexyl) Phthalate (DEHP)
description: DEHP is a type of phthalate used as a plasticizer in various products. It has been associated with reproductive and developmental issues.

name: Butyl Benzyl Phthalate (BBP)
description: BBP is a type of phthalate used as a plasticizer in various products. It has been associated with reproductive and developmental issues.

name: Dibutyl Phthalate (DBP)
description: DBP is a type of phthalate used as a plasticizer in various products. It has been associated with reproductive and developmental issues.

name: Diisobutyl Phthalate (DIBP)
description: DIBP is a type of phthalate used as a plasticizer in various products. It has been associated with reproductive and developmental issues.

name: Hexabromocyclododecane (HBCDD)
description: HBCDD is a flame retardant that has been used in a variety of applications, including insulation and textiles. It is persistent in the environment and has been linked to adverse health effects.

name: Perfluorooctane Sulfonate (PFOS)
description: PFOS is a synthetic chemical that has been used in a variety of applications, including firefighting foam and stain-resistant coatings. It is persistent in the environment and has been linked to adverse health effects.

name: PFOS-related compounds
description: PFOS-related compounds are a group of synthetic chemicals that have been used in a variety of applications, including firefighting foam and stain-resistant coatings. They are persistent in the environment and have been linked to adverse health effects.
